title: Al-Shabab Militants Attack University In Kenya
teaser: Al-Shabab militants attacked a college in Garissa, Kenya, killing nearly 150 people, wounding about 80 and holding others hostage. It was reminiscent of their 2013 attack on a Nairobi shopping mall.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
